form.IN:
Oblika za preteklik in pretekli deležnik je lahko
broadcasted
ali
broadcast
.

sense.def:
A broadcast
je tisto, kar slišimo po radiu ali vidimo na televiziji.

seg.quote: He was criticized for making these broadcasts.

sense.def:
To broadcast a programme
pomeni poslati oddajo v eter po radijskih valovih, da jo lahko slišijo po radiu ali vidijo na televiziji.

seg.quote: Episode One was broadcast last night.
